many-to-one.name: textsLanguage
many-to-one.title: Axelor texts languages (for descriptions of products, name of countries, aso.)

integer.name: exportPriceScale
integer.title: Number of digits after decimal point for sales price

boolean.name: exportNonSoldProducts
boolean.title: Export products not flagged as sellable
boolean.help: If checked, all products, event those not marked as non-sellable, will be exported

boolean.name: exportNonPrestashopOrders
boolean.title: Export non-Prestashop customers' orders
boolean.help: If checked, all orders will be synchronized to prestashop, not only those created on it

boolean.name: exportNonPrestashopCustomers
boolean.title: Export non-Prestashop customers
boolean.help: If checked, all customers will be synchronized to prestashop, not only those created on it

boolean.name: prestaShopMasterForCurrencies
boolean.title: Currencies are handled on prestashop
boolean.help: If checked, export process will not update existing remote currencies and local currencies data will be overwritten by PrestaShop data

boolean.name: prestaShopMasterForCountries
boolean.title: Countries are handled on prestashop
boolean.help: If checked, export process will not update existing remote countries and local countries data will be overwritten by PrestaShop data

boolean.name: prestaShopMasterForCustomers
boolean.title: Customers are handled on prestashop
boolean.help: If checked, export process will not update existing remote customers and local customers' data will be overwritten by PrestaShop data

boolean.name: prestaShopMasterForTaxes
boolean.title: Taxes are handled on prestashop
boolean.help: If checked, export process will not update existing remote taxes and local taxes's data will be overwritten by PrestaShop data

boolean.name: prestaShopMasterForCategories
boolean.title: Products categories are handled on prestashop
boolean.help: If checked, export process will not update existing remote categories and local categories' data will be overwritten by PrestaShop data

boolean.name: prestaShopMasterForProducts
boolean.title: Products are handled on prestashop
boolean.help: If checked, export process will not update existing remote products and local product's data will be overwritten by PrestaShop data

boolean.name: prestaShopMasterForOrders
boolean.title: Orders are handled exclusively on PrestaShop
boolean.help: If checked, this means that all orders are handled on prestashop. You'll not use Axelor for anything except creating orders that will be sent & managed on PrestaShop. This means, among other things, no stock handling on Axelor side. If unchecked, import process will only create order taken from prestashop and all order management will be done on Axelor.

one-to-one.name: defaultStatus
one-to-one.title: PrestaShop status for confirmed orders
one-to-one.help: Orders with a Confirmed/Finalized/Finished status but neither paid nor delivered nor invoiced will be set to this status

one-to-one.name: invoicedStatus
one-to-one.title: PrestaShop status for invoiced orders
one-to-one.help: Orders invoiced but not paid will be set to this status

one-to-one.name: paidStatus
one-to-one.title: PrestaShop status for paid orders
one-to-one.help: Orders paid but not delivered will be set to this status

one-to-one.name: deliveredStatus
one-to-one.title: PrestaShop status for delivered orders
one-to-one.help: Delivered orders will be set to this status

one-to-one.name: defaultPaymentCondition
one-to-one.title: Default payment condition
one-to-one.help: Used on import if no local payment condition with the same name as the PrestaShop one exists

one-to-one.name: defaultPaymentMode
one-to-one.title: Default payment mode
one-to-one.help: Used on import if no payment mode matches the remote one cannot be found

one-to-one.name: defaultShippingCostsProduct
one-to-one.title: Default product for deliveries fees
one-to-one.help: Used on import if carrier cannot be mapped to a local shipping cost product

one-to-one.name: discountProduct
one-to-one.title: Product used to apply discount to the whole order, not per product

one-to-one.name: defaultTax
one-to-one.title: Default tax rate
one-to-one.help: Used when tax rate cannot be determined

one-to-one.name: defaultSaleAccountForProduct
one-to-one.title: Default sale account for product
one-to-one.help: Used when import tax for the product

one-to-one.name: defaultSaleAccountForTax
one-to-one.title: Default sale account for tax
one-to-one.help: Used when import tax for accounting configuration of tax
